casebody.data:
MANHATTAN & HAZARDS BEACH EXCURSION COMPANY, Owner of the Steamer JULIETTE, Libelant-Appellee, v. Steamer HENDRIK HUDSON; Hudson River Day Line, Inc., Claimant-Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 6, 1929. No. 304. Hatch & Wolfe, of New York City (Carver W. Wolfe, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. William F. Purdy, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Deeree affirmed, with -costs.
